mapper.select: select cid,uid,ego_product.pid,title,property,price,count,product_pic from ego_user_shopping_cart,ego_product,ego_family where ego_user_shopping_cart.uid=#{uid} and ego_user_shopping_cart.pid=ego_product.pid and ego_product.fid=ego_family.fid order by ego_product.pid
mapper.delete: delete from ego_user_shopping_cart where uid=#{uid} and pid=#{pid}
